overview:
Brand architect Craig D. Crook is Co-Founder of New Media Cartel and President/CEO of TQM Network. Crook co-created New Media Cartel in 2010 to help executives leverage the sweet spot of technology, branding & business processes.

Crook’s role as CEO of TQM Network has exposed him to hundreds of best practices in management methodologies, as TQM facilitates learning focused on these areas.

Although Crook is a passionate learner, he has walked away from two degrees (Art & Business) just short of completion. In his leadership role at TQM Network, he has been trained as a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt and has led, organized or facilitated sessions around top innovation practices.
